thread.title: Anna Smetak Cardillo
thread.title_full: Eyes of India reviewed by Anna Smetak Cardillo

author: Anna Smetak Cardillo
title: Anna Smetak Cardillo
text: I had a good experience with eyes of India company. I bought some pillow covers on ebay from them. Items are exactly as described, came quickly in tidy package. Great communication from the company and even a follow up message making sure I was happy with my purchase.
